pullrequest.title: Refactor Playback into Playback and PlaybackHandle

content.raw:
One method we could consider for fixing disadvantage (1) is to have the `Playback` class and all the `PlaybackHandler` instances that it spawns share a `std::shared_ptr<Log>`.

Since that `Log` instance would only be held internally by classes that we control, we can ensure that the log is only being read from. Then the question becomes: Is it okay for multiple different consumers of a `Log` to be simultaneously retrieving batches using `Log::QueryMessages(~)` and then simultaneously iterating through them? I think that's a feature that we should be able to support anyhow if we can't already; otherwise our `Batch::iterator` implementation may need some work. It's probably worth writing tests for that.
